body_html:
I'm not sure, it was a docker machine. I've managed since then to install using pip from a different docker machine. But maybe you can specify what you just said about glibc in the Anaconda page or in the conda package? Maybe try to check the version in
Pre install script (http://conda.pydata.org/docs/building/build-scripts.html)?

body:
I'm not sure, it was a docker machine. I've managed since then to install using pip from a different docker machine. But maybe you can specify what you just said about glibc in the Anaconda page or in the conda package? Maybe try to check the version in  
Pre install script (http://conda.pydata.org/docs/building/build-scripts.html)?
